Summary: I was waking my dog when I saw the first two orange objects flying NE so I ran to the house & told my kids to come & see & then every two min we saw them fly over for time & saw 8 total.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Gastonia
There were no other sightings in Gastonia on or around November 9th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was waking my dog when I saw the first two orange objects flying NE. I was walking toward the house as the objects were flying over the houses. I tried to figure out what they were but when I realized I'd never seen anything like this before so I ran to the house & told my kids to come & see & then every two min we saw them fly over & saw 8 total. As they went over the orange light was dimer from behind the objects. I couldn't hear any noise from them so I asked my daughter if she heard anything and she said no. I was amazed and confused because I don't know what we had seen. I took some pictures with my phone just to show some proof. The sky was clear with some clouds. The normal air traffic looked routine for the time of day. The planes in the sky were clear & there lights were easy to see. The objects flew into a low cloud until they were out of sight.
